英文公告.機關名稱: TAIWAN RAILWAY ADMINISTRATION, MINISTRY OF TRANSPORTATION AND COMMUNICATIONS
英文公告.標案名稱: 2012~2016 Service and Maintenance of Air-Conditioning Systems and Equipment at the Taiwan Railway Building of Taipei Main Station; Wanhua Station; and Banqiao Station
英文公告.附加說明: 1.Working duration:(I) Work to start at 8:00 a.m. within three days after this Contract is signed for the Taipei Station Taiwan Railway Building. The implementation period shall be 46 months. (II) Work to start at 8:00 a.m. within three days after this Contract is signed for the Wanhua Station. The implementation period shall be four years. (III) Work to start at 8:00 a.m. within three days after this Contract is signed for the Banqiao Station. The implementation period shall be four years.2.Bidder qualification:(I) Permission for joining in tenders of signatories of the WTO Agreement on Government Procurement (PGA). (II) Company qualifications and supporting documents are identical to those required for domestic companies (except that the association membership certificate must be obtained prior to contract implementation). (III) Supporting documents on the registration of branches, subsidiaries, and/or offices approved by Taiwan's government.(IV) When a supporting document to be enclosed is written in a foreign language, local notarization or notarization or certification by an authentication institution is required, with enclosure of Chinese translation certified or authenticated by an institution authorized by the Republic of China Ministry of Foreign Affairs.3.Address for Obtaining Tender Documentation: Financial procurement section PURCHASING & STORE DEPARTMENT, Taiwan Railway AdministrationRoom.5075,5F, No.3 PEI-PING WEST ROAD,TAIPEI, TAIWAN.
